text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
February 3, 1958
Dr. Sam L. Becker, Director
Division of Television, Radio, Film
State University of Iowa
Television Center
609 10th Avenue
Coralville, Iowa
Dear Sam:
Just received, as mailed by Meaney. Keep the Report #21. I have
another. Keep the others - if you don't already have. Return those
which duplicate what you have.
Our best,
Harry d. SKiornia
Executive Director
HJS/dfc
